show_name: Eiga HappinessCharge PreCure! Ningyō no Kuni no Ballerina (movie)
other_title: 映画ハピネスチャージプリキュア！人形の国のバレリーナ (Japanese)
opening_theme: "Happiness Charge Precure! WOW!" (ハピネスチャージプリキュア！ＷＯＷ！) by Sayaka Nakaya
ending_theme: "Party Has Come" (パーティ ハズカム) by Hitomi Yoshida
insert_song: "Yūki ga Umareru Basho" (優希が生まれる場所, Where Courage is Born) by Cure Lovely/Megumi Nakajima, Cure Princess/Megumi Han, Cure Honey/Rina Kitagawa and Cure Fortune/Haruka Tomatsu
